verbs.description: WASHINGTON , D.C. - President Trump [V: has] thanked Noblesville West Middle School teacher Jason Seaman for his heroic efforts Friday in his science classroom . " Thanks to very brave Teacher & Hero Jason Seaman of Noblesville , Indiana for his heroic act in saving so many precious young lives .
